objective: Looking for a front-end developer position

languages.level: Professional working proficiency (C1 according to CEFR)

jobPositions.title: Front-End Developer
jobPositions.description: As part of the front-end team responsible for developing the user interface of a SaaS ERP software, I developed in TypeScript to ensure strong typing and reduce bugs. I created reusable components in React.js, styled with Tailwind CSS. I designed JavaScript libraries, including tools for financial calculations and accounting simplification. Additionally, I refactored code to enhance modularity and readability, simplifying it and adding unit tests to ensure quality.

jobPositions.title: Work and travel
jobPositions.description: Spent a year in Australia focused on improving language skills and experiencing a new culture. Improved English through daily interactions with native speakers and immersed in Australian culture and lifestyle.

jobPositions.title: Head of Data and Email Marketing
jobPositions.description: Coordinated email marketing and data enrichment initiatives at a specialized agency. Defined and implemented the strategy in collaboration with other teams, primarily the development team. Managed client relationships, planned tasks, and dispatched work.

jobPositions.title: Data and Email Marketing Project Manager
jobPositions.description: Managed email, retargeting, and data enrichment campaigns. Directed entire email campaigns, including client needs analysis, campaign scenario design, coding, targeting, routing, and performance tracking. Enriched data by segmenting the audience, aggregating, and reformatting data. Automated tasks using PHP scripts.

jobPositions.title: Web Designer
jobPositions.description: Graphic design and coding of websites and digital content. Designed websites, presentation materials, and newsletters. Translated designs into HTML and CSS, using platforms such as Qualifio and WordPress CMS.

jobPositions.title: Graphic Designer (Internship)
jobPositions.description: Gained practical experience in graphic design, advertising, and creative campaigns. Created visual materials such as logos, icons, and diagrams. Designed layouts for posters and catalogs. Researched ideas and concepts for an advertising campaign.

educationAchievements.title: Training course : “Graphic Designer : Print and Web”
Master of Fine Arts in Illustration
Bachelor’s degree in Fine Arts, major in illustration
High school, major in sciences and mathematics

onlineCourses.course: React for the rest of us
